name: Almighty Zeus
description: When an old Asian man is attacked and sprayed with hand sanitizer, a young boxer goes viral for knocking out the aggressor.

review.author: CharlieMadeIt
review.heading: !0 out of !0
review.reviewBody: Love the message behind this film! Stopping hate and creating unity amongst all races. It's gives us some action, lots of laughs, the drama and some cheesy romance to top it all which made this movie one for the books! I can say the director put a lot of thought and heart behind creating this amazing film. The cast did such an amazing job bringing this story to life and giving us such an amazing performance on the big screen! I really hope they make a sequel to this film as I would love to see how the romance plays out and to see how his fight has made a difference in the his community. I would recommend this to all of my friends.
